trans-unit.source: A control used for selecting a type.
trans-unit.target: 用於選取型別的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter> can be used imperatively or declaratively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter> 可以用命令方式或宣告方式使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use TypePresenter in a custom activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在自訂活動設計工具中使用 TypePresenter。

trans-unit.source: It binds the TypePresenter control to the "Text" property of the corresponding activity of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 它會 TypePresenter 控制項繫結至對應的活動，活動設計工具的 「 文字 」 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The "Text" property is of type "System.Type".
trans-unit.target: 「 文字 」 屬性為"System.Type"的類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> that initializes a collection of wrapper objects that each represent a primitive type.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> 的新執行個體，這個執行個體會初始化包裝函式物件的集合，其中每個物件都表示一個基本型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the string (<see langword="null" />) will be shown in the type presenter, which allows you to select null for the type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在型別展示器中顯示字串 (<see langword="null" />)，這樣可讓您針對型別選取 null。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property can be <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 屬性可以為 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="null" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the type <see langword="null" /> can be selected from the type presenter.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否可以從型別展示器選取 <see langword="null" /> 型別的相依性屬性識別項欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an indication whether the type browser should be shown directly when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> 控制項時，取得或設定是否直接顯示型別瀏覽器的指示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type browser should be shown directly when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用者按一下 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> 控制項時，應該直接顯示型別瀏覽器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the type browser should be shown directly when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> 控制項時，指定是否直接顯示型別瀏覽器的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the activity type resolver dialog window should be centered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否應該將活動型別解析程式對話方塊視窗置中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the window should be centered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該將此視窗置中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the activity type resolver dialog window should be centered.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該將活動型別解析程式對話方塊視窗置中的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a type browser dialog window should be centered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否應該將型別瀏覽器對話方塊視窗置中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the window should be centered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該將此視窗置中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the type browser dialog window should be centered.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該將型別瀏覽器對話方塊視窗置中的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of an editing context property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定編輯內容屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An editing context item.
trans-unit.target: 編輯內容項目。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that contains a property of the editing context, for instance a list of currently selected objects or a list of services running in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 包含編輯內容之屬性的相依性屬性識別碼欄位，例如，目前選取之物件的清單或在設計工具中執行之服務的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default types used most recently.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最近使用的預設型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> that contains the default types used most recently.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" />，其中包含最近使用的預設型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter used to show types.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示型別的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: A delegate with one return value and a Boolean value that represents the filter used to show types.
trans-unit.target: 具有一個傳回值和一個布林值的委派，這個委派表示用來顯示型別的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the following types are shown in the type presenter/type browser
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，下列型別會顯示在型別展示器/型別瀏覽器

trans-unit.source: Project system case
trans-unit.target: 專案系統案例

trans-unit.source: All public types in referenced assemblies/projects
trans-unit.target: 參考組件/專案中的所有公用型別

trans-unit.source: All public types in current project
trans-unit.target: 目前專案中的所有公用型別

trans-unit.source: Standalone XAML case (file in rehosted application/file opened in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] without solution opened)
trans-unit.target: 獨立 XAML 案例 (未開啟方案時，在 [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] 中開啟之重新裝載應用程式/檔案中的檔案)

trans-unit.source: All public types in all assemblies loaded in the AppDomain
trans-unit.target: 已載入 AppDomain 之所有組件中的所有公用型別

trans-unit.source: By setting the filter property, you can limit the number of types shown in the type browser to only those types that are valid for your activity.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過設定篩選屬性，將顯示在型別瀏覽器中的型別數目限制為僅適用於您活動的型別。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates what filter is used to show types.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於顯示型別之篩選的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Puts the keyboard focus on the current presenter control.
trans-unit.target: 將鍵盤焦點放在目前的展示器控制項上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a combo box.
trans-unit.target: 初始化下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: The contents of this method are generated by the designer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的內容是由設計工具產生。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumeration of wrapper types that are in the current type presenter.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於目前型別展示器之包裝函式型別的列舉。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of wrapper types that are in the current type presenter.
trans-unit.target: 屬於目前型別展示器之包裝函式型別的列舉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name for a component.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定元件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The display name for a component.
trans-unit.target: 元件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that defines the label of a control.
trans-unit.target: 定義控制項標籤的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the types used most recently.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最近使用的型別。

trans-unit.source: The types used most recently.
trans-unit.target: 最近使用的型別。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates the most recently used types.
trans-unit.target: 指定最近使用之型別的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Declaration of the event that gets raised when a property on the specified user interface control has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 當指定之使用者介面控制項的屬性變更時所引發之事件的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 已過時。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value used for a component display name.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於元件顯示名稱的值。

trans-unit.source: A string name.
trans-unit.target: 字串名稱。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that assigns the text that is used for a component display name.
trans-unit.target: 指派用於元件顯示名稱之文字的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the current <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: A type object.
trans-unit.target: 型別物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides event accessors for the <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserClosedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserClosedEvent" /> 的事件存取子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserClosedEvent> is raised when the user closes the browser.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者關閉瀏覽器時，會引發 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserClosedEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the user closed the browser.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者是否關閉瀏覽器的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Provides event accessors for the <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserOpenedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserOpenedEvent" /> 的事件存取子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserOpenedEvent> is raised when the user opens the browser.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者開啟瀏覽器時，會引發 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserOpenedEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the user opened the browser.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者是否開啟瀏覽器的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Provides event accessors for the <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeChangedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeChangedEvent" /> 的事件存取子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeChangedEvent> is raised when the user changes the type of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者變更選取之控制項的型別時，會引發 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeChangedEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the component type has changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否變更元件型別的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name for a component type.
trans-unit.target: 取得元件型別的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the display name.
trans-unit.target: 表示顯示名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Dependency property identifier field that designates the current type represented by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> 所表示之目前型別的相依性屬性識別碼欄位。
